levelAssTooltip.title: Level Assumption
levelAssTooltip.desc: Changes mainstat value to be at least a specific level. Does not change substats.

modal.title: Character Priority for Equipped Artifacts
modal.desc1: When generating a build, the Optimizer will only consider equipped artifacts from characters below the current character or those not on the list.
modal.desc2: If the current character is not on the list, the Optimizer will only consider equipped artifacts from others characters that are not on the list.

constraintFilter.title: Build Constraints
constraintFilter.tooltip: Set certain requirements that generated builds must confirm to. e.g. Generated builds must have at least 140% Energy Recharge.

setCond.title: Default Artifact Set Conditional Effects
setCond.text: Some artifact set effects provide conditional stats. This window allows you to select those effects, so they can contribute stats when a build that satifies a set effect is calculated during optimization.

ArtSetFilter.title: Artifact Sets <1>Allowed<1></1></1> / <3>Excluded<1></1></3>
ArtSetFilter.intro: You can allow/exclude which sets you want the builder to consider. In the following examples, A is on-set, and R is rainbow(off-set)
